attributes.action: Nigel Farage to be knighted for helping give Great Britain back its independence
attributes.background:
Nigel Paul Farage has campaigned tireless over many years to make Britain "Great" again by breaking the dictatorial shackles of the unelected European Union. 

On June 24th 2016, the electorate of Great Britain voted to leave the EU and regain its sovereignty. 

Arise - Sir Nigel Farage

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
